net.dempsy.output

Class CronOutputSchedule

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.dempsy.output.CronOutputSchedule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable, OutputScheduler, Service

    public class CronOutputSchedule
extends Object
implements OutputScheduler
    The Class CronOutputScheduler. This class executes @Output method on MPs based on provided cron time expression (example: '*\/1 * * * * ?', run job at every one sec)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CronOutputSchedule(String cronExpression)
      Instantiates a new cron output scheduler.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getConcurrency() 
      boolean isReady() 
      void setConcurrency(int concurrency) 
      void setOutputInvoker(OutputInvoker outputInvoker)
      This method will be called by Dempsy to provide the instance of outputInvoker.
      void start(Infrastructure infra)
      This method will be called by Dempsy to tell the OutputExecuter that it can begin executing the @Output methods of MPs with the OutputInvoker.
      void stop()
      This method will be called by Dempsy in order to get the OutputExecuter to stop executing @Output methods of MPs.

    • Method Detail

      • getConcurrency

        public int getConcurrency()

      • setConcurrency

        public void setConcurrency(int concurrency)

      • start

        public void start(Infrastructure infra)
        Description copied from interface: OutputScheduler
        This method will be called by Dempsy to tell the OutputExecuter that it can begin executing the @Output methods of MPs with the OutputInvoker. #start() will always be called after #setOutputInvoker() . This method execution will be stopped, when OutputScheduler.stop() is called from Dempsy.
        Specified by:
        start in interface OutputScheduler
        Specified by:
        start in interface Service

      • isReady

        public boolean isReady()
        Specified by:
        isReady in interface Service

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Description copied from interface: OutputScheduler
        This method will be called by Dempsy in order to get the OutputExecuter to stop executing @Output methods of MPs. Under normal circumstances the #start() is still executing and the OutputScheduler.stop() should cause the #start() to stop.
        Specified by:
        stop in interface OutputScheduler
        Specified by:
        stop in interface Service

      • setOutputInvoker

        public void setOutputInvoker(OutputInvoker outputInvoker)
        Description copied from interface: OutputScheduler
        This method will be called by Dempsy to provide the instance of outputInvoker.
        Specified by:
        setOutputInvoker in interface OutputScheduler
        Parameters:
        outputInvoker - the output invoker
